law.text:
Kinds of assets may be deposited by an insurer as follows:
Title to unencumbered real property lawfully acquired and held by the insurer under this code.
Lawful money of the United States, and other securities of kinds in which the insurer may lawfully invest its funds under this code.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 8, sec. 3, effective June 18, 1970.
